item.title: They still think they do not copy
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com

item.title: Only Apple would do this
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded: Apple announced iPad Air and iPad mini with retina display today and they did that without crippling iPad mini retina in any way. Other companies are known to cripple their cheaper products to drive customers to more expensive products. And to top it all, productivity apps are free.

item.title: Another iPhone
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded: Will be difficult for competitors to copy.

item.title: WWDC 2013
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded: Biggest surprise, MacPro. Mavericks will launch at the same time as MacPro.

item.title: New Camera v1.1.1
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded:
New Camera version 1.1.1 is in review with Apple
It contains fix for an issue where images do not appear when updated from version 1.0 to 1.1. Images are not lost, they are there but album is not able to read them. This issue has been resolved and will be available as an update (version 1.1.1) and is a must for all users.

item.title: New Camera with Facebook support
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded:
New Camera v1.1 is now available on the AppStore.
✔ Adds support for Dropbox. Pictures can be added to Dropbox
✔ Adds support for uploading image to Facebook
✔ Images are are saved as JPEGs to device album
...✔ Camera controls rotate as per device orientation

item.title: Back From WWDC
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately, most of it is under NDA.
There are lot of changes coming in Mountain Lion which are important for developers and users alike. Most of the applications on Mac AppStore will require good amount of work for Sandboxing. Mountain Lion also brings few bugs which cannot be discussed but will need a work around. All the apps will be released to AppStore when Mountain Lion released in July. At the same time they will also be made compatible with Retina display.

item.title: New Camera App released on the AppStore
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded:
Includes many advanced features and an intuitive, easy-to-use interface.
✓ ✔ Continuous (burst) shooting mode (low, medium or high speed)
✓ ✔ Self-timer camera mode (with variable delay and a blinking indicator)
... ✓ ✔ An attractive vertical grid layout to view your photos
✓ ✔ An option to password-protect your photo album for added privacy
✓ ✔ An option to add photos to the standard device photo library

item.title: Canon 5D Mark III
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded:
Finally Canon has released (will release) something that can considered to be in same class as EOS 3. Hopefully its autofocus will perform as good.
...http://www.dpreview.com/news/2012/03/02/Canon-EOS-5D-Mark-III-preview
http://www.dpreview.com/news/2012/03/02/Canon-5D-Mark-III
...http://www.usa.canon.com/cusa/consumer/products/cameras/slr_cameras/eos_5d_mark_iii
...http://web.canon.jp/imaging/eosd/samples/eos5dmk3/

item.title: School bus application design video
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded: Video showing design details of School Bus application is now available on website.

item.title: Special Grammy award for Steve Jobs
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded:
Steve Jobs honoured with "Trustees Award". Apple’s senior vice president of Internet Software and Services, Eddy Cue accepts the award on his behalf.
grammy.com
MacRumours.com

item.title: School bus status application released
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.content:encoded: Ottawa-Carleton School Bus Status application for iOS devices is now available on the AppStore. This application provides automatic school bus status notifications on iPhone, iPod touch or iPad devices. Please visit the AppStore or the application’s website for more details.

item.title: New website open
item.dc:creator: bvsingh@lightoncanvas.com
item.dc:subject: Home
item.content:encoded: Welcome to our completely re-designed LightOnCanvas.com website! Please use the tabs on the top to read about our products and services.
